hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ata that 'Attab bin Asid said that :when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sent him to Makkah, he forbade him from profiting off of what he did not possess

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ، مَا لَيْسَ عِنْدَكَ وَعَنْ رِبْحِ، مَا لَمْ يُضْمَنْ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Selling What Is Not With You, And From Profiting On What You Do Not P
